recipes.name: Comforting Oatmeal Bowl
instructions: Bring liquid to a boil in a pot
Add oats and reduce heat to medium-low
Top with sliced banana, honey, and cinnamon

recipes.name: Energizing Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: Granola and fresh fruit for topping
instructions: Blend frozen bananas, berries, spinach, and milk until smooth
Top with granola and fresh fruit
